channel.title: Development on OJ's Perspective
channel.description: Recent content in Development on OJ's Perspective

item.title: New Livestream Series
item.description: TL;DR We’re going to build a .NET implementation of Meterpreter live on stream. Together. From scratch. Read on for all the details! The Backstory I remember kicking off my first ever live stream on Twitch back in September 2016. It feels like a lifetime ago already. That stream, broken up into two parts (1, 2), was me breaking open the Capcom.sys driver that had a blatant backdoor in it and abusing this backdoor to get NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM privileges.
